user_query: gonna do if your watch cracks then we'll know that something is going on okay almost there we're holding hands i like holding hands do you have the time [Music] i can tell by the unbridled excitement on your faces it's about giving people the most precious gift possible this is a great opportunity and i say grab it what do you think is anything's possible yes so if you're the same then everything else today will be the same is it what if she doesn't get in the cab what if i take her out of london tell me what can i do there must be something i can do just one thing appreciate her and what you have just love her you haven't got much time oliver [Music] i'm sorry sam lottie [Music] can i help you i know you don't know me i'm a friend of lottie's never seen you around me do you know samantha andrews i love miss anne if i was just a few years younger zinc i've never met your family they've been busy i want to see where you became the man i love you guys hey why don't you tell me about him sam let's just forget about everything i just want to be here with you yeah an intense closeness really sharing things with each other nothing could hurt us i love you [Music] your dad was a very handsome guy you know when i was a kid my dad was my hero and he was so proud with his job at the factory wasn't just any job to him everyone loved him though sounds wonderful yes well he was they all lost their jobs he never found another this became his second home i just wish i could have helped him
